descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of how context clues can aid in determining word meaning.
Struggles to use context clues; meaning of unfamiliar words is largely unclear.
Identifies context clues but struggles to apply them effectively to determine word meaning.
Adequately uses context clues to infer the meaning of unfamiliar words with some accuracy.
Proficiently uses context clues to accurately determine the meaning of unfamiliar words and phrases.
Masterfully uses context clues to determine nuanced meanings of words and phrases, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of context.
Unable to identify or use common Greek or Latin affixes and roots to determine word meaning.
Shows minimal awareness of affixes and roots; unable to apply this knowledge effectively.
Identifies some affixes and roots but struggles to connect them to word meanings.
Uses common affixes and roots to infer the general meaning of words with some success.
Effectively uses knowledge of affixes and roots to accurately determine the meaning of many words.
Demonstrates expert-level understanding of affixes and roots, using them to precisely determine the meaning of complex vocabulary.
Does not use reference materials (dictionaries, thesauruses, etc.) to clarify word meaning.
Attempts to use reference materials but is unable to locate relevant information or misinterprets the information found.
Uses reference materials with limited success; may struggle to find the correct definition or pronunciation.
Consults reference materials to find definitions, pronunciations, and parts of speech with reasonable accuracy.
Uses a variety of reference materials effectively to determine precise meanings, pronunciations, and etymologies.
Selects and uses reference materials expertly to gain a comprehensive understanding of words, including nuances of meaning and historical context.
Does not attempt to verify the meaning of unfamiliar words.
Attempts to verify meaning is absent or flawed.
Attempts to verify word meaning but verification strategies are inconsistent or inaccurate.
Verifies the meaning of words with moderate success.
Consistently verifies the inferred meaning of words through context and reference materials.
Analyzes and verifies preliminary word meanings through the use of context and reference materials.
